scripts.synth: npm run clean && cdk synth --profile default
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run synth && npm run bootstrap && env-cmd -f ./envs/dev cdk deploy --profile default
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run synth && npm run bootstrap && env-cmd -f ./envs/prod cdk deploy --verbose
scripts.destroy:dev: npm run synth && npm run bootstrap && env-cmd -f ./envs/dev cdk destroy --profile default
scripts.destroy:prod: npm run synth && npm run bootstrap && env-cmd -f ./envs/prod cdk destroy --profile default
scripts.local: npm run synth && env-cmd -f ./envs/offline sam local start-api -t ./cdk.out/HelloCdkStack.template.json --env-vars local.env.json
